TopicTitle: Aether Corporation | Planes | Spaceplanes | Rockets // [HIRING][TAKING ORDERS]

Articles.Content:
Good day. This is the Aether Corporation. A private owned company specializing in the development of Airplanes, spaceplanes and rockets.

Our goal is to supply Kerbin with a standard of vessels, mainly focusing on maneuverability. The corporation is owned by Princess Kimberlah of Kerbinanium. Our headquarters are located in the beautiful city of Kerbinanium, nearby the shared KSC. We are looking to attract new engineers to help us achieve our goal. If you wish to become an engineer, please contact the owner herself.

Airplanes:

The current flagship of the company's fleet is the magnificent Squirrel. When you manage to get it off the ground which may be a pain in the arse for inexperienced pilots, our main focus becomes truth. You can do any strange stunts you want and it will stay stable. When things go wrong, this vessel is easy to glide back home.

With the intend to create a cheap commercial vessel, we came up with the Cyrial Mk1. It is fast, easy to handle. Again, this vessel is hard to get off the ground.

Rockets:

Time your launch right and this vessel will get you on a trajectory to Eve in less than 2 minutes! Note, I've only made it to Eve once with this vessel.

Download link:

http://www./?qxu20ae0jde35if

We've just accidently created a rocket that is able to go to ANY planet! This wasn't planned, we wanted a Duna rocket. When Jeb tried getting an encounter with Duna, he didn't get what he wanted, instead, he got something even better! He's heading to Jool! Our scientists state that Jeb made a very risky move burning on to Jool but we all know Jeb.

Mods used:

MechJeb (the 1m thing)

Download link:

http://www./?n75yrv85w96vust

Spaceplanes:

Our very first attempt at creating a spaceplane capable of orbiting our planet and returning safely is the Makosian V1 Prototype. It's easy to take off unlike our other craft so far and everytime we flew it, it always went into orbit. WARNING: It's a prototype.

ALMOST! A-A-ALMOST!

Download link:

Makosian V1 Prototype.craft

We are still looking for ideas such as Munar rockets etcetera. Untill then, our fleet will remain quite empty!

So please request whatever you like. Anything is possible for us to create

Edited October 17, 2012 by Kimberlah
Hey could you hire me? I would love to design some planes for you

Perhaps screenshots would be better at daytime?

Hmm...I am interested in joining your "corporation" here. I will supply planes and rockets very soon...Tell me if I'm accepted. I donate lots of my time to this, such as doing homework later

I have got a very nice plane for you, easy to get off the ground, it gets off at 80 m/s which it does in about 3-5 seconds, and has great maneuverability, unless there is a huge amount of lag. Here's the craft file:[ATTACH]34866[/ATTACH]

I can also design a mun lander for your company if you'd like.
Hmm can you possibly hire me? I have a fetish for sph

We've just accidently created a rocket that is able to go to ANY planet! This wasn't planned, we wanted a Duna rocket. When Jeb tried getting an encounter with Duna, he didn't get what he wanted, instead, he got something even better! He's heading to Jool! Our scientists state that Jeb made a very risky move burning on to Jool but we all know Jeb. The rocket will be up in this thread soon
